member.name: M:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.BookingController.GetServicesForBooking(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get available services for client booking.
member.returns: Returns if client is unauthorized. Returns if client is authorized with services list if there is at least one available service and with empty list if there is no available service.
member.remarks: Returns Unauthorized if client is unauthorized. Returns Ok if client is authorized with services list if there is at least one available service and with empty list if there is no available service.

member.name: M:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.BookingController.GetDatesForBooking(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get available dates to provide a service with id by coach with id .
member.returns: Returns if client is unauthorized. Returns if client is authorized with dates list if there is at least one available date and with empty list if there is no available date.
member.remarks: Dates will be returned in format "MM.dd.yyyy" as a string. Returns Unauthorized if client is unauthorized. Returns OK if client is authorized with dates list if there is at least one available date and with empty list if there is no available date.

member.name: M:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.BookingController.GetTimeSlotsForBooking(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get available time slots to provide a service with id by coach with id as of the .
member.returns: Returns if client is unauthorized. Returns if client is authorized with time slots list if there is at least one available time slot and with empty list if there is no available time slot.
member.remarks: Date should be in format "MM.dd.yyyy" as a string. Time will be returned in format "HH:mm" as a string. Returns Unauthorized if client is unauthorized. Returns OK if client is authorized with time slots list if there is at least one available time slot and with empty list if there is no available time slot.

member.name: M:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.BookingController.AddBooking(PMFightAcademy.Client.Contract.Dto.BookingDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.returns: if client is unauthorized. if client is authorized and a booking was successfully added. if client is authorized and booking time is not available anymore or booking model is invalid.
member.remarks: Returns Unauthorized if client is unauthorized. Returns OK if client is authorized and a booking was successfully added. Returns BadRequest if client is authorized and booking time is not available anymore or booking model is invalid.

member.name: T:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.ClientsController
member.summary: Client controller. Formats of phone number: +38067 111 1111 38067 111 1111 067 111 1111 Available country codes: 039, 067, 068, 096, 097, 098, 050, 066, 095, 099, 063, 093, 091, 092, 094 Password must have at least 8 chars At least 1 upper char and at least 1 number

member.name: M:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.ClientsController.Register(PMFightAcademy.Client.Contract.Dto.ClientDto,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.returns: with string result message if client was successfully registered. if data is invalid. if already exists.
member.remarks: Returns OK with json = { token: "jwt-token" } if client was successfully registered. Returns BadRequest if data is invalid. Returns Conflict if login already exists.

member.name: M:PMFightAcademy.Client.Controllers.ClientsController.Login(PMFightAcademy.Client.Contract.LoginContract,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Log in in a registered client.
member.returns: with string jwt-token if client was successfully logged in. if login or password are invalid.
member.remarks: Returns OK with json = { token: "jwt-token" } if client was successfully logged in. Returns BadRequest if login or password are invalid.
